title: [Good] Snapchat honors the requirements set forth in the Digital Millennium Copyright Act

tosdr.case: [Good] Snapchat honors the requirements set forth in the Digital Millennium Copyright Act-good-undefined
tosdr.tldr: Snapchat honors the requirements set forth in the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. They will remove any infringing material that they are aware of and will terminate the user's account.  You can report suspected copyright infringement with a form or file notice with their designated agent.
